bio: Amateur cyclist, crypto addicted and addicted
contributionDescription: I use the optimism network because it has low fees and transactions are faster than those of other competing networks. Being a simple user, I can contribute by staking the tokens, thus increasing the security and liquidity of the chain. My contribution was therefore marginal but I have now adopted optimism as my favorite network
impactDescription: I use the optimism network because it has low fees and transactions are faster than those of other competing networks. Being a simple user, I can contribute by staking the tokens, thus increasing the security and liquidity of the chain. My contribution was therefore marginal but I have now adopted optimism as my favorite network
pwCategorySuggestions: Layer 2 Scaling, End-User Experience, Governance & Tokens
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for being outside of RetroPGF's scope. The applicant only states they use and stake tokens on the network but does not showcase a tangible contribution requiring a minimum time commitment of 1 hour.
